videos.title: Sobreviviendo la carrera más difícil de mi vida en bicicleta. bikepacking, gravel. Transcordilleras
videos.description:
Transcordilleras is a gravel race, multi-day, 8 stages, self-assisted that goes over the 3 mountain ranges of Colombia, the east, the central, and the west.

Enjoy this story of a former downhill racer that challenged himself to survive this epic race and in the end, it almost cost him his life with the nastiest crash of his life.

videos.title: Paseo épico 400 km, sufrimiento al máximo, paisajes únicos, carrera de gravel Colombia #cycling 2024
videos.description:
¡Aventura en Bicicleta por el Eje Cafetero: 400 Km de Gravel entre Medellín y Filandia 🚴‍♂️🌄 2024

¿Te apasiona el ciclismo de aventura y el gravel? ¡Este es el video que estabas esperando! Acompáñanos en un emocionante viaje de 4 días en bicicleta desde Medellín hasta Filandia en el Eje Cafetero, recorriendo 400 kilómetros y enfrentando 10,000 metros de desnivel. A lo largo de este épico recorrido por carreteras alternas conoceremos los caminos de la colonización antioqueña, un trayecto lleno de historia, paisajes impresionantes y, por supuesto, mucha acción.

🏁 Al final del viaje, llegamos a competir en una emocionante carrera de gravel donde ponemos a prueba nuestra resistencia y habilidades. Si eres amante del ciclismo de montaña, el ciclismo de aventura o simplemente disfrutas de los desafíos al aire libre, ¡este video es para ti!

👉 ¡Dale like, suscríbete y activa la campanita para no perderte más aventuras épicas como esta! 🔔

Ruta: Medellin, Aguadas, Salamina, Santa Rosa de Cabal, Filandia + SALVAJE Gravel Fest.
-------------------
Epic 4-Day Cycling Adventure from Medellín to Filandia | 400 Km Gravel Ride through Colombia’s Coffee Region 🚴‍♂️🌄

Are you into adventure cycling or gravel biking? Then you don’t want to miss this! Join us on a thrilling 4-day bike trip from Medellín to Filandia, covering 400 kilometers and tackling a total of 10,000 meters of elevation. Along the way, we’ll ride through alternate roads, discovering the historic routes of Antioquian colonization — an unforgettable journey full of history, breathtaking landscapes, and plenty of action.

🏁 At the end of the trip, we compete in a challenging gravel race, testing our endurance and cycling skills. If you’re a fan of mountain biking, gravel cycling, or outdoor endurance challenges, this video is for you!

👉 Don’t forget to like, subscribe, and hit the bell icon for more epic cycling adventures! 🔔

videos.title: My first bikepacking race: Transcordilleras in Colombia on a Scarab Paramo
videos.description:
Transcordilleras is a gravel bikepacking race in Colombia that includes a non-stop, an eight-day, and a three-day format. I headed down to Medellín to do the three-day as my first-ever bikepacking race.

The mountains were enormous, the gravel was brutal, the people were generous and the food was delicious. It was an adventure!

I was lucky enough to test a custom Scarab Paramo made in Retiro, Colombia that I built up with Shimano's new 12-speed mechanical GRX gravel group.

Were my gears low enough? Were my 40- and 45mm tires big enough? Only one way to find out...

-
Thanks to Bert for the bikepacking shoes for off the bike: https://thebertshoe.com/

-
